mapper.select: select count(*) as count from fund INNER JOIN company ON fund.fund_company = company.company_id INNER JOIN investstate ON fund.fund_investstate = investstate.state_id INNER JOIN productstate ON fund.fund_productstate = productstate.state_id

SELECT fund.fund_id, fund.fund_num, fund.fund_investstate, fund.fund_name, fund.fund_productstate, fund.fund_manager, fund.fund_company, fund.fund_minbuymoney, fund.fund_minsalemoney, fund.fund_buyratio, fund.fund_saleratio, fund.fund_salebegintime, fund.fund_workbegintime, fund.fund_text, fund.fund_npv, fund.fund_checkstate, company.company_id, company.company_buildtime, company.company_signmoney, company.company_name, company.company_legalperson, company.company_lineperson, company.company_website, company.company_phone, company.company_introduce, company.company_address, company.company_checkstate, investstate.state_id as inv_id, investstate.state_name as inv_name, investstate.state_level as inv_lev, productstate.state_id as pro_id, productstate.state_name as pro_name FROM fund INNER JOIN company ON fund.fund_company = company.company_id INNER JOIN investstate ON fund.fund_investstate = investstate.state_id INNER JOIN productstate ON fund.fund_productstate = productstate.state_id

SELECT fund.fund_id, fund.fund_num, fund.fund_investstate, fund.fund_name, fund.fund_productstate, fund.fund_manager, fund.fund_company, fund.fund_minbuymoney, fund.fund_minsalemoney, fund.fund_buyratio, fund.fund_saleratio, fund.fund_salebegintime, fund.fund_workbegintime, fund.fund_text, fund.fund_npv, fund.fund_checkstate, company.company_id, company.company_buildtime, company.company_signmoney, company.company_name, company.company_legalperson, company.company_lineperson, company.company_website, company.company_phone, company.company_introduce, company.company_address, company.company_checkstate, investstate.state_id as inv_id, investstate.state_name as inv_name, investstate.state_level as inv_lev, productstate.state_id as pro_id, productstate.state_name as pro_name FROM fund INNER JOIN company ON fund.fund_company = company.company_id INNER JOIN investstate ON fund.fund_investstate = investstate.state_id INNER JOIN productstate ON fund.fund_productstate = productstate.state_id limit #{startPage,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{endPage,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT fund.fund_id, fund.fund_num, fund.fund_investstate, fund.fund_name, fund.fund_productstate, fund.fund_manager, fund.fund_company, fund.fund_minbuymoney, fund.fund_minsalemoney, fund.fund_buyratio, fund.fund_saleratio, fund.fund_salebegintime, fund.fund_workbegintime, fund.fund_text, fund.fund_npv, fund.fund_checkstate, company.company_id, company.company_buildtime, company.company_signmoney, company.company_name, company.company_legalperson, company.company_lineperson, company.company_website, company.company_phone, company.company_introduce, company.company_address, company.company_checkstate, investstate.state_id as inv_id, investstate.state_name as inv_name, investstate.state_level as inv_lev, productstate.state_name as pro_name, productstate.state_id as pro_id FROM fund INNER JOIN company ON fund.fund_company = company.company_id INNER JOIN investstate ON fund.fund_investstate = investstate.state_id INNER JOIN productstate ON fund.fund_productstate = productstate.state_id where fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: fund_id, fund_num, fund_investstate, fund_name, fund_productstate, fund_manager, fund_company, fund_minbuymoney, fund_minsalemoney, fund_buyratio, fund_saleratio, fund_salebegintime, fund_workbegintime, fund_text, fund_npv, fund_checkstate
mapper.insert: insert into fund (fund_id, fund_num, fund_investstate, fund_name, fund_productstate, fund_manager, fund_company, fund_minbuymoney, fund_minsalemoney, fund_buyratio, fund_saleratio, fund_salebegintime, fund_workbegintime, fund_text, fund_npv, fund_checkstate) values (#{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundInveststate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundProductstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fundMinbuymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fundMinsalemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fundBuyratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fundSaleratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fundSalebegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fundWorkbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fundText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundNpv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fundCheckstate,jdbcType=INTEGER})

fund_num,

mapper.update:
update fund
fund_num = #{fundNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fund_investstate = #{fundInveststate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fund_productstate = #{fundProductstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_manager = #{fundManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_company = #{fundCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER},
fund_minbuymoney = #{fundMinbuymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fund_minsalemoney = #{fundMinsalemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fund_buyratio = #{fundBuyratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fund_saleratio = #{fundSaleratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fund_salebegintime = #{fundSalebegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fund_workbegintime = #{fundWorkbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fund_text = #{fundText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fund_npv = #{fundNpv,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
fund_checkstate = #{fundCheckstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fund set fund_num = #{fundNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fund_investstate = #{fundInveststate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_name = #{fundName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fund_productstate = #{fundProductstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_manager = #{fundManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_company = #{fundCompany,jdbcType=INTEGER}, fund_minbuymoney = #{fundMinbuymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fund_minsalemoney = #{fundMinsalemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fund_buyratio = #{fundBuyratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fund_saleratio = #{fundSaleratio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fund_salebegintime = #{fundSalebegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fund_workbegintime = #{fundWorkbegintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fund_text = #{fundText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fund_npv = #{fundNpv,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, fund_checkstate = #{fundCheckstate,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fund_id = #{fundId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
